description:
A cross-platform software for text translation and recognize.


4.0.0 (2025-11-24)
New feature:
- Providing online translation services. You can directly access major AI providers and DeepL translation services through our platform
- Add Claude Cloud、DeepSeek Cloud、Minimax Cloud、Moonshot Cloud、Tongyi Cloud、ChatGLM Cloud
- Custom ChatGLM model name
Bugs fixed:
- fix lingva service not working
- fix glm undefined error
